title: Client Location
description: The Cient Location screen allows administrators to view, create, edit, and delete client location within the system.
functionality: View a list of all Location and their details.
Search Location by latitude, longitude, or person details(contact info.).
Edit Location details such as latitude, longitude, or person details(contact info.).
ui_elements: Location table with columns for location, latitude, longitude, and Actions.
Search bar and filter dropdowns for easy user navigation.
Edit and delete buttons within each user row.
Create location button at the top of the page.
navigation: User can access the Location Management screen through the main sidebar navigation under the 'Client' section.
user_permissions: Access to the Client Location Management screen is restricted to users with administrator privileges.
additional_notes: Ensure that sensitive client information is handled securely and that deletion actions are irreversible to prevent accidental data loss.
